name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
1. parallelism + topic sentences
2. illogical comparisons and mixed construction 
3. words and dictions 
4. narrative paragraph
5. (cont.) + Mechanics (capital letters, Italics, the apostrophe,   
   the hyphen, numbers) 
6. describing paragraph 
7. objective v.s. subjunctive description 
8. explaining with examples 
9. Mid-term exam
10. comparing and contrasting paragraph 
11. (cont.)
12. classifying paragraph 
13. (cont.)
14. defining paragraph 
15. (cont.)
16. organization and analysis 
17. review 
18. final exam
scorePolicy:
1. attendance and performance (10%)
2. assignments (20%)
3. writing (40%)
4. quizzes and exams (30%)
materials:
Writing Clear Paragraphs 
by Roberts B. Donald    (Crane) 
Correct Writing 
by Butler Hickman McAlexander  (Books)
